summary: Ken Boyd, a lonely man fresh out of the loony bin, who sets out to kill those he deems responsible for his miserable life.
cast: Kevin Corrigan|Barry Bostwick|Karen Black|Leo Fitzpatrick|Ariel Gade|Eric Price|Lucy Davis|Lou Beatty Jr.|Janie Haddad Tompkins|Ahmed Best|Christopher May|Niko Nicotera|Britain Spellings|Jonathan Fraser|Lindsay Hollister|Laura Kightlinger|Robert E. Beckwith|Vanessa Mizzone|Regan Burns|Nadine Crocker|Harlie Vaughn|Maile Carnahan|Eric Burnett|Griff Kohout|Lucy Angelo|Jim Bachert|Chris Darkes|Ward Edmondson|Kari Irwin|Sharon Diane King|Brandon Lafourche|Lindsey Leino|Precious Love Mundy|Lauren Alayne Plagens|Alex Plaisance|Gaya Verneuil|Mary Wang|Josephinne Zelaya
title: Some Guy Who Kills People
